abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews documentary Revenge of the Electric Car, directed by Chris Paine.
snippet: Chris Paine’s “Revenge of the Electric Car,” the follow-up to “Who Killed the Electric Car?,” is a slick, enjoyable valentine to a retooling industry.
lead_paragraph: Chris Paine’s “Revenge of the Electric Car,” the follow-up to “Who Killed the Electric Car?,” is a slick, enjoyable valentine to a retooling industry.

headline.main: An Electric Car Drives an Industry’s Change
headline.content_kicker: Movie Review | 'Revenge of the Electric Car'
headline.seo: Chris Paine’s ‘Revenge of the Electric Car’ — Review
headline.kicker: Movie Review | 'Revenge of the Electric Car'
